.`` In deciding who should take the business forward, we wanted someone with the right mix of leadership, vision and hard-core engineering chops,'' Steve Ballmer said in an e-mail to all employees Wednesday. We wanted someone who could define the future of business computing and further expand our ability to bring the cloud to business customers and developers in game-changing ways.
